topics.body:
So I read Bleach, One Piece, and Toriko.
Bleach: Ichigo and his buds are about to fight Yhwach.

One Piece: Luffy's getting ready to fight Doflamingo.

Torkio: Toriko and the gang are fighting The Monkey King. [spoiler]That is until the Monkey King saw something that LITERALLY made his balls fall off.[/spoiler]
